metadata.title: CVE-2021-22208 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting versions starting with13.5 up to 13.9.7. Improper permission check could allow the change oftimestamp for issue creation or update.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
